remarks: Define the uniform structure extractor function.  Similarly with ~ df-topn this differs from ~ df-unif when a structure has been restricted using ~ df-ress ; in this case the ` UnifSet ` component will still have a uniform set over the larger set, and this function fixes this by restricting the uniform set as well.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.)
statement: df-uss $p |- UnifSt = ( f e. _V |-> ( ( UnifSet ` f ) |`t ( ( Base ` f ) X. ( Base ` f ) ) ) ) $.
